title: Our governance

details.body:
Terms of reference

The institute’s draft terms of reference are being reviewed by the board and will be published in April 2017. The terms explain our legal status, powers, and roles and responsibilities of executive officers and committees.

Our board members

  • Antony Jenkins (Chair)
  • Dr Katherine Barclay: Director, UK Skills, Worldwide R&D, Pfizer Ltd
  • Sir Gerry Berragan: Lieutenant General (retired) the army
  • Paul Cadman: HR Director, Walter Smith Fine Foods Ltd
  • Dame Fiona Kendrick: Chairperson and CEO, Nestle UK and Ireland
  • Dame Asha Khemka: Principal and Chief Executive, West Nottinghamshire College Group
  • Robin Millar CBE: Chairperson, Blue Raincoat Chrysalis Group
  • Toby Peyton-Jones: HR Director, Siemens UK and Northern Europe
  • Bev Robinson: Principal and Chief Executive, Blackpool and The Fylde College

Our senior management

  • Peter Lauener: Chief Executive
  • Mike Keoghan: Deputy Chief Executive Officer
  • Jonathan Mitchell: Deputy Director, Standards Development
  • Ana Osbourne: Deputy Director, Approvals
  • Jayne McCann: Deputy Director, Funding Policy
  • Alex Wilson: Deputy Director, Data Science
  • Nikki Christie: Deputy Director, Assessment
  • Helen Knee: Deputy Director, Corporate Effectiveness
  • Tony Singleton: Deputy Director, Set up and Finance
  • Richard Guy: Strategic Adviser

Our sub-committees

The board is establishing 4 committees:

  • approval and funding committee
  • quality assurance committee
  • audit and risk assurance committee
  • remuneration committee

The board is also setting up 3 advisory groups:

  • stakeholder reference panel
  • apprentice panel
  • apprenticeships quality improvement group ‘quality alliance’
